SEARCH
Package clack.message

Class Message

java.lang.Object
clack.message.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileMessage, HelpMessage, ListUsersMessage, LoginMessage, LogoutMessage, OptionMessage, TextMessage
public abstract class Message extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an abstract message in the Clack system. This class serves as a base for specific types of messages and implements the Serializable interface for object serialization.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message(String username, MsgTypeEnum msgType)
      Constructs a Message with the specified username and message type. Initializes the timestamp to the current instant.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user creating the message
      msgType - the type of message

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this Message to the specified object for equality. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a Message object that has the same message type, timestamp, and username as this object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare this Message against
      Returns:
      true if the given object represents a Message equivalent to this Message, false otherwise
